# SePrice Medical Clinic Management System

Complete React application with Tailwind CSS for managing SePrice medical clinic.

## Project Status: ✅ COMPLETED

### Features Implemented

- ✅ User authentication with role-based access (receptionist, doctor, administrator)
- ✅ Complete module structure: Patients, Professionals, Specialties, Appointments, Waiting Room, Reports, Configuration
- ✅ Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- ✅ Full CRUD operations for patient management
- ✅ Professional medical interface
- ✅ Role-based navigation and permissions

### Progress Summary

- [x] Project structure created
- [x] React + Tailwind + Vite setup
- [x] Authentication system implemented
- [x] All modules scaffolded and functional
- [x] Dependencies installed and working
- [x] Development server running on port 3001
- [x] Complete documentation and README

### How to Run

1. `npm install` - Install dependencies
2. `npm run dev` - Start development server
3. Open http://localhost:3001
4. Use test users: recepcion/123456, doctor/123456, admin/123456
